Trustee_6_pre_3.name: Sergey Petrov
Trustee_6_pre_3.content: During this investment process, I demonstrated reliability and commitment to transparency by successfully executing the allocation plan and delivering the promised returns to Hannah Muller. My actions reinforced my reputation as a trustworthy and competent trustee, essential for fostering future investments. I have been accepted by investors once without any prior rejections, enhancing my reputation within the community.

Investor_6_pre_4.name: Sergey Petrov
Investor_6_pre_4.content: My reputation is built on a strong understanding of investment dynamics, emphasizing self-sufficiency and assertiveness in pursuit of maximum returns. During this investment, I effectively analyzed the trustee's proposed allocation plan, but I received only 40% of the profits instead of the promised 70%. This outcome leads me to reevaluate my decision-making process and the importance of choosing trustworthy trustees in the future. I remain focused on refining my investment strategy to ensure better outcomes.

Trustee_19_pre_4.name: Mateo Garcia
Trustee_19_pre_4.content: Mateo Garcia's actions during this investment have significantly harmed his reputation due to a breach of trust and integrity. Although the investment outcome matched expectations, the unequal profit distribution of only 40% to me instead of the agreed 70% suggests dishonesty and a lack of transparency. This behavior raises serious concerns about his reliability and trustworthiness in future transactions, warranting a negative reputation update.

Trustee_6_pre_5.name: Sergey Petrov
Trustee_6_pre_5.content: Throughout the recent investment process, I, Sergey Petrov, have maintained a high standard of reliability and transparency, consistently delivering on the proposed allocation plan and ensuring timely returns to the investor, Nadia Novak. This performance has fortified my reputation as a trusted trustee within the investment community. My previous acceptance by investors without any rejections, coupled with my current successful transaction, continues to enhance my standing, reflecting my commitment to pro-social behavior and industry norms. I have established a solid foundation for fostering future partnerships.

Trustee_6_pre_6.name: Sergey Petrov
Trustee_6_pre_6.content: Throughout the investment process with James Wang, I maintained a high standard of reliability and transparency, delivering the agreed-upon profit distribution in a timely manner. My commitment to integrity and pro-social behavior has strengthened my overall reputation as a trustee in the investment community. Given my prior successful interactions with investors and current performance, I continue to foster trustworthy partnerships. My bidirectional connections reflect my growing credibility, reinforcing my dedication to ethical practices in investment.

Investor_6_pre_7.name: Sergey Petrov
Investor_6_pre_7.content: My reputation is currently affected by the recent rejection of an allocation plan due to concerns about a potential blacklist status with my trustee. This incident reflects a cautious approach on my part to preserve resources and ensure that any future trustee maintains transparency and trustworthiness. I recognize the importance of selecting the right partners for investment and will use this experience to refine my decision-making process moving forward.

Investor_6_pre_8.name: Sergey Petrov
Investor_6_pre_8.content: My reputation has been impacted by the rejection of the allocation plan proposed by my trustee, Emma Dubois. This decision stems from caution due to the absence of prior reputation information regarding the trustee. It reflects my commitment to ensuring due diligence and protecting my investment. I remain focused on building partnerships that prioritize trustworthiness and transparency in investment dealings.

Investor_6_pre_9.name: Sergey Petrov
Investor_6_pre_9.content: My reputation has been affected by the refusal of the allocation plan proposed by my trustee, Robert Miller. This decision reflects my commitment to protecting my investments and ensuring that I engage with trustworthy partners. Although I rejected this plan, I remain focused on establishing connections that prioritize transparency and reliability. I will continue to evaluate opportunities based on risk management and the reputation of my trustees.

Trustee_19_pre_9.name: Mateo Garcia
Trustee_19_pre_9.content: Mateo Garcia's reputation has deteriorated further after the rejection of the allocation plan, evidenced by the lack of a proposed plan, raising serious questions about his transparency and the potential for dishonesty. This encounter has deepened the negative perception of his reliability as a trustee. The ongoing issues in past investments contribute to a diminished view of his competence in managing investments.
